page.text: The President (spoke in Spanish): I should like
to inform the Council that I have received letters from
the representatives of Algeria, Argentina, Australia,
Bangladesh, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Cuba, Egypt, India,
the Islamic Republic of Iran, Iraq, Japan, Jordan,
Malaysia, Morocco, Pakistan, South Africa, Spain,
Tunisia, Turkey and Ukraine, in which they request to
be invited to participate in the discussion of the item
on the Council's agenda. In conformity with the usual
practice, I propose, with the consent of the Council, to
invite those representatives to participate in the
discussion, without the right to vote, in accordance
with the relevant provisions of the Charter and rule 37
of the Council's provisional rules of procedure.
There being no objection, it is so decided.
In accordance with the decision taken at the
4474th meeting, I invite the representative of Israel to
take a seat at the Council table.
